name: Young People Survey
data_intro: In 2013, students of the Statistics class at FSEV UK were asked to invite their friends to participate in this survey. The data file (responses.csv) consists of 1010 rows and 150 columns (139 integer and 11 categorical). For convenience, the original variable names were shortened in the data file. See the columns.csv file if you want to match the data with the original names. The data contain missing values. The survey was presented to participants in both electronic and written form. The original questionnaire was in Slovak language and was later translated into English. All participants were of Slovakian nationality, aged between 15-30.

cat_feature_intro.original: * The original questionnaire was in Slovak language and was later translated
cat_feature_intro.short: * For convenience, the original variable names were shortened in the
cat_feature_intro.Smoking: Indicates the frequency or habit of smoking, rated from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'Never' and 5 means 'Very often'.
cat_feature_intro.Alcohol: Indicates the frequency or habit of consuming alcohol, rated from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'Never' and 5 means 'Very often'.
cat_feature_intro.Punctuality: Indicates the degree of punctuality, rated from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'Always late' and 5 means 'Always on time'.
cat_feature_intro.Lying: Indicates the tendency to lie, rated from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'Never lie' and 5 means 'Lie frequently'.
cat_feature_intro.Internet usage: Indicates the frequency of internet usage, rated from 1 to 5, where 1 means 'Never' and 5 means 'Very often'.
cat_feature_intro.Gender: * (in slovak) Sleziak, P. - Sabo, M.: Gender differences in the prevalence of specific phobias. Forum Statisticum Slovacum. 2014, Vol. 10, No. 6. [Differences (gender + whether people lived in village/town) in the prevalence of phobias.]
cat_feature_intro.Left - right handed: Indicates whether the participant is left-handed or right-handed.
cat_feature_intro.Education: Indicates the education level of the participant. The level may correspond to high school, university, etc.
cat_feature_intro.Only child: Indicates whether the participant is an only child (1 if true, 0 if false).
cat_feature_intro.Village - town: Indicates whether the participant lives in a village or a town (1 for village, 0 for town).
cat_feature_intro.House - block of flats: Indicates whether the participant lives in a house or an apartment block.
